name: XWUI Item Group Component
description: Container component for multiple XWUIItems that handles lists and trees of items. Supports collapsible lists, inline grids, various flow types (list, table, free, grid), and item interaction handlers. Uses XWUIItem components internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

isCollapsed.description: Whether the group is initially collapsed

highlightedItem.description: ID of the currently highlighted item

onItemClick.description: Click handler function (not serializable in JSON)

onItemRightClick.description: Right-click handler function (not serializable in JSON)

onItemAction.description: Action handler function (not serializable in JSON)

group_stops.description: Whether to show stops/separators between items

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the item group

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
